sentences: Manchester Utd won 3 - 1 over Arsenal.

data.tweet: Manchester Utd took six shots on target, up from two in their last game (against Leicester City).

Manchester Utd took two shots on target against Leicester City in their previous game.
story: Shots on target (in last match v Leicester City)

data.tweet: Manchester Utd only carried the ball into the opponent's box four times, while Arsenal did so 10 times. United completed four passes into the Arsenal box, considerably less than the 8.6 average for Premier League teams this season
sentences: Manchester Utd carried the ball into the opponent's box four times.
Arsenal carried the ball into the opponent's box 10 times.
Manchester Utd managed to play an impressive 4 successful balls into the opponent's box.
Premier League teams have averaged 8.6 passes into the opponent's box per 90 minutes.
story: Passes into the penalty area (league average)

data.tweet: United gave Arsenal time on the ball, pressing only 11 times in the final third, while the Premier League average is 31 times per 90 minutes. Arsenal made seven tackles in the final third, while United made one
sentences: Manchester Utd pressed their opponent 11 times in the final third.
Premier League teams have pressed in the final third an average of 31 times per 90.
Manchester Utd attempted to make one challenges in the final third.
Arsenal attempted to make seven challenges in the final third.
This season, Arsenal have averaged 4.0 attempted challenges in the final third per 90 minutes.
Premier League teams attempted to make 2.5 challenges in the final third per 90 minutes.
story: Tackles in the final third (season average)
Tackles in the final third (league average)

data.tweet: Manchester Utd made 27 clearances, considerably more than the eight from Arsenal. In their last game (against Leicester City) United made 10 clearances. Man United also won 11 aerial duels (69%) to Arsenal's five.
sentences: Manchester Utd made 27 clearances.
Arsenal made eight clearances.
In their last game (against Leicester City) Manchester Utd made 10 clearances.
Manchester Utd won 11 aerial duels.
Arsenal won five aerial duels.
This season, Arsenal have won an average 15 aerial duels per 90 minutes.
Manchester Utd won an impressive 69% or the game's aerial duels.
Arsenal won 31% or the game's aerial duels.
story: Clearances (in last match v Leicester City)

data.tweet: Double goal scorer Marcus Rashford was our man of the match. He found chances worth 0.8 xG and successfully played three balls into the final third (more than any other Man Utd player).

Marcus Rashford scored two goals.

Marcus Rashford more successful balls into the final third than any other Man United player.
